headline: Lennox Schedules First Quarter Results
summary: Lennox (NYSE: LII), a leader in energy-efficient climate control solutions, will report first quarter 2025 financial results before the market opens on Wednesday, Apr 23, 2025. An earnings conference call and webcast are scheduled for the same day at 8:30 a.m. Central Time. CEO Alok Maskara and CFO Michael Quenzer will provide a summary of the company's financial results and outlook, followed by a question-and-answer session.
